players.name: Alice
memory: You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Charlie: "Charlie was the one who killed Bob last night. Keep an eye on Alice."
Diana: "Charlie, your confession is weird. If you're the killer, explain why. And why suspect Alice?"
Charlie: "I'm the mafioso and I killed Bob. Alice is likely an informant, which would explain why Charlie suspects her."
Diana: "Charlie's confession makes him the prime suspect. We should vote him out today."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Alice, Diana voted for Charlie
